websites.title: Websites
websites.intro: I craft ultra-focused micro websites that load fast, look sharp, and clearly communicate your message. Whether you’re launching a product, promoting a service, or building a personal brand — I’ll build you a site that works like a digital handshake: professional, memorable, and uniquely yours.

projects.title: Lumen Retreats
projects.description: A calm, earthy one-pager promoting a wellness retreat in Sweden. Responsive, minimal, and immersive.

projects.title: Local Coffee Shop Site
projects.description: Micro site with menu, location, and a warm, welcoming vibe. Built for mobile-first.

projects.title: Artist Portfolio
projects.description: Dark-mode gallery site for a freelance illustrator. Lightweight, scroll-free with image modals.

projects.title: Freelancer Promo Page
projects.description: Single screen with a strong pitch and booking CTA for a freelance consultant.

design.title: Design
design.intro: Simplicity meets character. I design with clarity and intent — no clutter, no fluff. Whether it’s a brand identity or a layout, I combine clean structure with playful energy to create designs that feel human and alive. Each piece is custom-built, not templated.

projects.title: Rutger zorgboerderij
projects.description: Een vernieuwde vormgeving gebaseerd op hun oude stijl. Modern, groen, zorgzaam

projects.title: Siep katten trimsalon
projects.description: Het ontwerpen van een logo en huisstijl voor een katten trimsalon

projects.title: Dicey Dungeons Game design
projects.description: UI and UX Design, Character design of a mobile game called Dicey Dungeons

projects.title: Baby announcement ontwerp
projects.description: Een simplistic baby kaartje met unieke illustratie.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.intro: Let’s build something together. Whether you need a website, a brand refresh, or a design sparring partner — I’d love to hear your story.
